text: Nicolás Almagro was the defending champion but lost in the final, 7–6(7–5), 6–4, to Jerzy Janowicz. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw AON Open Challenger - Singles Category:AON Open Challenger
